member.name: TRANSLATEURL_IN_FLAGS
member.summary: The TRANSLATEURL_IN_FLAGS enumerated values are used with the function to determine how it will execute.

member.name: TRANSLATEURL_IN_FLAGS.TRANSLATEURL_FL_GUESS_PROTOCOL
member.summary: If the protocol scheme is not specified in the pcszURL parameter to , the system automatically chooses a scheme and adds it to the URL.

member.name: TRANSLATEURL_IN_FLAGS.TRANSLATEURL_FL_USE_DEFAULT_PROTOCOL
member.summary: If the protocol scheme is not specified in the pcszURL parameter to , the system adds the default protocol to the URL.
